作者单独出具商业授权协议文件: Author to produce a separate commercial authorization agreement document

也不提供可直接交付的产品: Nor offer products that can be delivered directly

至少也得自行接入后端数据读取: At least you have to access backend data.

作者不接受邮件提需求: Author does not accept mail requests
协议的核心要求用通俗的语言解释如下: The core requirements of the agreement are explained in plain language as follows:
无论你或你的下游怎么使用: No matter how you or your downstream use it.
都必须把你最终的代码全部完整公开出来: We have to make all your final codes public.
不只是给出修改的部分: It's not just the part that gives changes.
也不是说换个框架重写一遍就能和原始代码脱离关系了: It doesn't mean that rewriting the frame would separate from the original code.
网络服务也要开源: We need to open up the network.
即使你只是用: Even if you just use it.
的代码做了一个网站或网络服务: The code did a website or a network service.
别人通过网络用你的服务时: When people use your services online,
你也需要遵守上一条: You'll have to follow the previous one.
你不能删掉代码里原来的作者信息和许可证声明: You can't delete the original author's information and license statement from the code.
得告诉大家这代码是从哪儿来的: We have to tell everyone where the code came from.
代码上加一些限制: Put some restrictions on the code.
比如不让别人再分发代码: Like not getting people to distribute the code again.
或者要求别人付费才能使用代码: Or ask someone else to pay for the code.
也不对使用后果负责: And not responsible for the consequences of the use.
详细协议内容见官方文档: The details of the protocol can be found in the official document.

协议许可证声明或改用其他协议: Agreement licence declaration or conversion to other agreements
这些仓库的代码在事实上仍然属于: The codes of these warehouses still actually belong to them.
使画布适应当前屏幕: Fit canvas to the current screen
在左侧插入一列: Insert a column to the left
在右侧插入一列: Insert a column to the right
粘贴来自系统剪贴板的图片: Paste pictures from the system clipboard
将外部选中文字拖拽到画布中: Drag external selected text to canvas
非专业设计人士可以用该应用绘制基本形状: Unprofessional designers can use the application to draw basic shapes
向右长距浮入: Float to the right long distance
向右长距浮出: Float to the right long distance
从左缩小滑出: Slide out of Left Zoom Out
用于画笔或橡皮位置跟随: Use to draw pens or rubber positions to follow
鼠标是否处在画布范围内: Whether the mouse is within the canvas
处在范围内才会显示画笔或橡皮: You can only show brushes or rubbers in the range.
计算鼠标两次移动之间的距离: Calculate the distance between two moves of the mouse
根据鼠标两次移动之间的距离: Move distance between two moves by mouse
上方添加同级大纲: Add the same level outline above
下方添加同级大纲: Add the same level of outline below
每次选择非预设颜色时: Every time you select a non-preset colour
需要将该颜色加入到最近使用列表中: Need to add the colour to the most recent list
检查环境是否支持原生取色吸管: Check if the environment supports the primary pigmentation straw.

犯罪心理的形成: The formation of a criminal mind
犯罪类型与心理特征: Types of crime and psychological characteristics
本章将介绍犯罪心理学的定义: This chapter will introduce the definition of criminal psychology
基本理论及其研究领域: Fundamental theories and their fields of study
犯罪心理学是研究犯罪行为及其心理机制的学科: Criminal psychology is the subject of research into criminal behaviour and its psychological mechanisms.
旨在理解犯罪者的心理特征和行为动机: The aim is to understand the psychological characteristics and motives of the perpetrator.
犯罪心理学的发展历史: History of the development of criminal psychology
随着心理学和法学的发展逐渐形成独立学科: As psychology and jurisprudence develop, they become independent disciplines.
包括犯罪心理成因: Including the psychological causes of crime.
犯罪心理评估与干预等: Criminal Psychological Assessment and Intervention, etc.
生物学等学科密切相关: The subjects of biology are closely related.
神经生理等因素对犯罪行为的影响: The effects of neurophysiology and other factors on criminal behaviour
情感等心理因素与犯罪行为的关联: The link between emotional and other mental factors and criminal behaviour
文化背景等对犯罪心理的塑造作用: Cultural background, etc., in shaping crime psychology
全面解释犯罪心理: A full explanation of criminal psychology.
本章将探讨个体因素: This chapter will look at individual factors.
环境因素及心理过程对犯罪心理的影响: Impact of environmental factors and psychological processes on the psychological aspects of crime
研究基因与犯罪行为之间的潜在联系: Research on the potential link between genes and criminal behaviour
探讨人格特质如攻击性: To explore personality characteristics like offensiveness.
冲动性与犯罪的关系: The relationship between motivation and crime
分析反社会人格障碍等心理疾病对犯罪行为的推动作用: Analysis of the contribution of mental disorders, such as antisocial personality disorders, to criminal behaviour
家庭暴力等对犯罪心理的长期影响: Long-term impact of domestic violence, etc. on the psychological aspects of crime
教育方式对犯罪心理的塑造作用: The role of education in shaping crime psychology
社区环境对犯罪行为的诱导作用: Inducing crime in a community environment
失业等经济问题与犯罪率的关系: Economic problems such as unemployment in relation to crime rates
探讨文化价值观对犯罪心理的影响: Exploring the impact of cultural values on crime psychology
决策模式及其对行为的影响: Patterns of decision-making and their impact on behaviour
情感缺失与犯罪行为的关系: The relationship between emotional loss and criminal behaviour
研究犯罪者的内在动机: Studying the inner motives of the perpetrator
分析犯罪者在实施犯罪前的决策过程及其心理机制: Analysis of the decision-making process prior to the commission of a crime and its psychological mechanisms
本章将分析暴力犯罪: This chapter will analyse violent crime.
财产犯罪及网络犯罪的心理特征: Psychological features of property crime and cybercrime
探讨谋杀者的心理动机: To explore the psychological motives of the murderer.
利益争夺等: We're fighting for benefits and so on.
分析抢劫者的冒险心理及对暴力的依赖: Analysis of the risk-taking mentality of robbers and reliance on violence
研究性犯罪者的心理扭曲及行为模式: Study of psychological distortions and behavioural patterns of sex offenders
探讨家庭暴力施暴者的控制欲及情感缺陷: Exploring control and emotional deficiencies of perpetrators of domestic violence
分析盗窃者的侥幸心理及对物质的渴望: Analysis of the larceny and the desire for material.
探讨诈骗者的欺骗技巧及心理操纵能力: Exploring fraud techniques and psychological manipulation of fraudsters
研究贪污者的权力欲望及道德沦丧: To study the corrupters' desire for power and moral degradation.
分析洗钱者的风险规避心理及法律规避策略: Diagnosing the risk of a money launderer's psychological and legal circumvention strategy
探讨黑客的技术崇拜及对权威的挑战心理: Exploring hackers ' technical worship and power challenges
分析网络诈骗者的伪装能力及心理操纵技巧: Analysis of cyber fraudsters ' ability to disguise and psychological manipulation techniques
研究网络暴力施暴者的匿名心理及攻击性: Research on anonymous psychology and aggressiveness of cyber-violence abusers
探讨网络成瘾者对虚拟世界的依赖及其与犯罪行为的关联: Exploring the dependence of Internet addicts on the virtual world and its links to crime
本章将介绍犯罪心理评估方法及干预策略: This chapter will present the methodology for the psychological assessment of crime and intervention strategies.
通过标准化测试评估犯罪者的心理状态及人格特征: Assessment of the psychological state and personality characteristics of offenders through standardized testing
观察犯罪者的日常行为: Observing the routine behaviour of offenders
分析其行为模式及心理动机: Analysis of patterns of behaviour and psychological motives
通过深度访谈了解犯罪者的心理历程及犯罪动机: Understanding the psychological history of the perpetrator and the motives for the crime through in-depth interviews
通过典型案例分析犯罪者的心理特征及行为规律: Analysis of the psychological characteristics and patterns of behaviour of offenders through typical cases
通过心理咨询和治疗帮助犯罪者纠正心理问题: Helping offenders to redress psychological problems through psychological counselling and treatment
通过行为训练帮助犯罪者改变不良行为模式: Helping offenders to change bad behaviour patterns through behavioural training
通过法律手段对犯罪行为进行约束和惩罚: Legal regulation and punishment of criminal acts
通过早期心理干预预防潜在犯罪者的行为问题: Prevention of behaviour of potential offenders through early psychological intervention
通过教育提升公众的法律意识及心理健康水平: Raising legal awareness and mental health through education
通过社区活动增强社会凝聚力: Enhancing social cohesion through community activities
通过政策制定减少社会不平等: Reducing social inequality through policy development
本章将探讨犯罪心理学在刑事司法: This chapter will address the issue of criminal psychology in criminal justice
犯罪预防及研究教育中的应用: Application in crime prevention and research education
通过心理分析描绘犯罪者的特征: Characterization of offenders through psychological analysis
运用心理学方法提高审讯效率: Use of psychological methods to improve the efficiency of interrogations
研究证人的心理状态及其对证词可信度的影响: Study of the psychological state of witnesses and its impact on the credibility of testimony
分析陪审员的心理过程及其对判决结果的影响: Analysis of the jury ' s psychological process and its impact on the outcome of the judgement
通过心理干预和社会支持预防犯罪行为的发生: Prevention of crime through psychological intervention and social support
通过心理治疗帮助服刑人员纠正心理问题: Helping persons in prison with psychological problems through psychotherapy
通过社区支持帮助犯罪者重新融入社会: Reintegration of offenders through community support
通过心理评估和干预降低犯罪者的再犯可能性: Reducing the likelihood of reoffending offenders through psychological assessment and intervention
通过科学研究深化对犯罪心理的理解: Deepen understanding of crime psychology through scientific research
提升犯罪心理学的应用水平: Enhancing the application of criminal psychology
通过培训提升司法人员的心理学知识和技能: Enhancement of the psychological knowledge and skills of judicial personnel through training
通过学术交流促进犯罪心理学领域的国际合作与发展: Promoting international cooperation and development in crime psychology through academic exchange
本章将探讨犯罪心理学在技术应用: This chapter will explore the technical application of criminal psychology.
跨学科合作及伦理挑战方面的未来发展方向: Future directions for interdisciplinary cooperation and ethical challenges
利用人工智能技术分析犯罪数据: Analysis of crime data using artificial intelligence techniques
通过大数据技术挖掘犯罪行为的规律及心理特征: Exploiting patterns and psychological features of crime through big data technology
利用虚拟现实技术模拟犯罪场景: Simulation of crime scenes using virtual reality technology
研究犯罪者的心理反应: Study the psychological response of offenders
通过神经科学研究探索犯罪行为的生物学基础: Explore the biological basis of criminal behaviour through neuroscientific research
加强心理学与法学的合作: Strengthening cooperation between psychology and law
提升司法系统的科学性: Enhancing the scientific nature of the judicial system
通过心理学与医学的结合: Through the combination of psychology and medicine
深化对犯罪心理的理解: Deepening the understanding of crime psychology
通过心理学与社会学的交叉研究: Through a cross-cutting study of psychology and sociology
全面分析犯罪现象: Comprehensive analysis of the crime phenomenon
结合心理学与信息技术: Integration of psychology and information technology
开发犯罪预防与干预的新工具: Development of new tools for crime prevention and intervention
探讨犯罪心理学研究中的伦理困境及解决方案: Exploring ethical dilemmas and solutions in criminal psychology research
研究犯罪心理学应用中如何保护个人隐私: Studying how to protect personal privacy in criminal psychology applications
分析犯罪心理学数据的安全风险及防护措施: Analysis of security risks and protective measures for criminal psychology data
探讨犯罪心理学在未来发展中可能面临的技术与社会挑战: Exploring the technical and social challenges that crime psychology may face in future development
